text:
[Verse]
Running through the streets
Splashing in the puddles
Feet up off the ground
Lost inside this hustle

[Verse 2]
Music in the air
Raindrops on our skin
Feel the rhythm start
Let the dance begin

[Chorus]
Dancing dancing in the rain
Feel the joy forget the pain
Twirl around don't be afraid
We are free on this parade

[Verse 3]
Laughing like we're kids
Carefree and alive
Underneath the clouds
Letting our hearts dive

[Bridge]
No more worries now
Just the storm and us
In this crazy world
We find what we trust

[Verse 4]
Shadows disappear
When we move as one
In this rainy world
Our dance has begun
title: Dancing in the Rain
